abstract: BP, the British energy giant, moved closer to losing control of its joint venture in Russia after the operation’s chief executive was forced to leave the country Thursday because he could not get a work visa.
lead_paragraph: BP, the British energy giant, moved closer to losing control of its joint venture in Russia after the operation’s chief executive was forced to leave the country Thursday because he could not get a work visa.

headline.main: Chief of BP Venture Forced to Leave Russia
